CustomField.formula: ((Krow__Invoice_Amount__c - (Krow__Invoice_Amount__c * Krow__Discount__c)) * Krow__Tax__c) + ( (Krow__Additional_Amount_Total__c - (Krow__Additional_Amount_Total__c * Krow__Discount__c)) * Krow__Tax__c) + ( (Krow__Fixed_Fee_Amount__c - (Krow__Fixed_Fee_Amount__c * Krow__Discount__c)) * Krow__Tax__c) + ( (Krow__Expense_Amount__c - (Krow__Expense_Amount__c * Krow__Discount__c)) * Krow__Tax__c)
CustomField.label: Total Tax Amount
